biotools.summary: Web based application designed to integrate protein structure, protein sequence and protein annotations in a unique graphical environment. The current version of the application offers a unified, enriched and interactive view of EMDB volumes, PDB structures and Uniprot sequences where the protein annotations stored in Uniprot, Immune Epitope DB, Phospho Site Plus, BioMuta and dSysMap can be explored interactively at sequence and structural level.

bioschemas.name: 3DBIONOTES
